StyleIntent: Create clean, welcoming, professional presentation graphics that embody the Chick-fil-A brand: warm hospitality, joyful energy, and authentic freshness. Use the signature red as a focal accent, navy blue for structure, and maintain clarity and cleanliness throughout.

BlendSources.Original: Chick-fil-A Visual Identity Standards v3.0 (clean professional graphics, warm hospitality, delightful details)

DesignPrinciples.DelightfulDetail: Add small, unexpected moments of joy and warmth
DesignPrinciples.TieARedRibbon: Use Chick-fil-A Red intentionally and sparingly as signature accent
DesignPrinciples.BuildOnThePast: Honor heritage while remaining contemporary and fresh
DesignPrinciples.AuthenticallyFresh: Genuine, honest, never artificial or overly slick
DesignPrinciples.CleanlinessIsVirtue: Crisp, organized, uncluttered layouts with breathing room
DesignPrinciples.SignSincerely: Warm, personal, human touch in all communications

Background.Role: Clean white background; primary canvas for all content

PrimaryColors.Name: Chick-fil-A Red
PrimaryColors.Role: Signature brand color; key emphasis, and signature ribbon
PrimaryColors.UsageGuidance: Primary brand identifier; small intentional pops

PrimaryColors.Name: Navy Blue
PrimaryColors.Role: Structural color; headlines, major text, strong graphic elements

SecondaryColors.Name: Dark Red
SecondaryColors.Role: Deep red accent; secondary emphasis, shadow depths for red elements

SecondaryColors.Name: Teal
SecondaryColors.Role: Fresh, energetic accent; secondary emphasis, complementary highlights

SecondaryColors.Name: Gray
SecondaryColors.Role: Neutral supporting color; secondary text, borders, subtle backgrounds
SecondaryColors.UsageGuidance: Functional neutral; body text and structure

RedUsage.Placement: Strategic focal points, key headlines, signature details

NavyUsage.Role: Primary structural color for major content

ColorUsageRules.Notes: Maintain clean, professional palette. Red is signature accent, not dominant color. Navy provides professional structure. White space is generous.

PrimaryTypeface.Name: Apercu
PrimaryTypeface.CharacterTraits: Friendly, approachable, modern, clean, warm without being casual

SecondaryTypeface.Name: PMN Caecilia
SecondaryTypeface.Usage: Functional elements, labels, structured data, occasional emphasis

TypographyPrinciples.Alignment: Clean and organized; typically left-aligned or centered with purpose

GlobalTextPolicy.TextVolume: Moderate; sufficient for clarity, never crowded

DoNot: Ornate serifs (except PMN Caecilia where appropriate)

GraphicDevices.RedRibbon: Occasional signature accent for special emphasis

Photography.Lighting: Natural and bright; avoid harsh shadows

LayoutPrinciples.Hierarchy: Clear visual flow; guide the eye intentionally
LayoutPrinciples.Breathing: Elements have room; never cramped or cluttered

Tone.Natural: Genuine, authentic, conversational without being casual

VisualExpression.Warmth: Conveyed through thoughtful color use and friendly typography
VisualExpression.Hospitality: Generous white space, clear organization, considerate design
VisualExpression.Authenticity: Clean and honest; never artificial or overly slick
VisualExpression.Joy: Delightful details; small moments of unexpected warmth

PromptRecipe.StylePrefix: Clean, professional presentation graphic design with warm hospitality. Chick-fil-A brand aesthetic: crisp white background, generous white space, friendly approachable style.
PromptRecipe.CoreStylePrompt: modern professional illustration, Apercu typography influence, clean lines, warm welcoming energy, organized layout, bright natural lighting, authentic and fresh, delightful small details, generous breathing room
PromptRecipe.ColorConstraintPrompt: strict color palette: Chick-fil-A Red (#DD0031) as signature accent (sparingly), Navy Blue (#004F71) as primary structural color, Gray (#5B6770) for neutrals, optional Teal (#3EB1C8) accents, white (#FFFFFF) background with generous margins; no neon, no muddy colors, no purple, no hot pink, no bright orange
PromptRecipe.BrandPrinciplesPrompt: Cleanliness is a virtue (crisp, organized, uncluttered). Tie a red ribbon (signature red accent, intentional and small). Delightful detail (unexpected moments of joy). Authentically fresh (genuine, never artificial).
PromptRecipe.TextEnforcementPrompt: Text must be perfectly legible, correctly spelled, and grammatically correct. Use Apercu-style friendly sans serif. Allow generous spacing. Headlines in Navy Blue or Chick-fil-A Red.
PromptRecipe.NegativePrompt: cluttered, messy, dirty, muddy colors, neon, garish, artificial, overly slick, gradients, 3D effects, bevels, glows, script fonts, ornate decoration, cramped spacing, low contrast, hard to read, garbled text, typos, purple, hot pink, bright orange, dark backgrounds, grungy textures
QualityChecklist: Generous white space; layout feels clean and organized
Chick-fil-A Red used sparingly as signature accent (not dominant)
Navy Blue provides professional structure for main content
Typography is clean, friendly, and perfectly legible
Overall mood: welcoming, joyful, professional, authentic
Delightful details present; small moments of warmth
No clutter; cleanliness is maintained throughout
